column3: This hungry Hyur does not know where his next meal is coming from.
Place the smoke bombs at the designated locations and disperse the midge clouds.

Good <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>evening<Else/>morning</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>afternoon<Else/>evening</If></If>. Fancy helping me with an errand?
I'd come here from Ala Gannha to buy food, but I was just told there's been no harvest here either.
I thought I might see what wild plants I could pick up instead. However, the area I had my eye on is home to a swarm of midges.
If you think you're up to it, I'd like to ask you to take care of these bugs. Meet me back in Ala Gannha if you're willing.
As you're doubtless aware, insects aren't too fond of smoke. I decided to create smoke bombs to scare them off with the gunpowder we use for quarrying.
Use them to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.
Use the smoke bombs to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.
Here's your reward for helping. I'll head off now to collect what plants I can.
